message.body: Are you in new ulm now?
No, gonna be back tomorrow night and leave Tuesday night. What about you?
Also, does the name Blair buffington ring a bell?
No??? And I'll be in new ulm tomorrow
Not tonight?
Yea, in a few hours for a week or so
Did you want to hang?
Or are you with family?
Do you want to see me?
I'm driving back to new ulm right now
I mean, it makes me pretty anxious but if we can just be relaxed and normal then it might be nice. Do you want to?
(01/02) I do. What on earth could you be anxious about ? And not sure I know what normal means anymore so maybe help me out with that. I might be hanging with m
(02/02) y brother tonight but maybe free later tonight. Otherwise tomorrow before 3
Well just be in touch I suppose
What's better for you?
Tonight or tomorrow?
Yeah
Or not at all
It doesn't actually make a difference- if you had plans already then do those
I want to see you
Ok I'll let you know
Hey just got home a bit ago and want to pack so I have tomorrow free. You free tomorrow?
Sorry I'm so late
You free in an hour or two? Maybe two...
Yea, I just have to run some errands. What do you feel like doing?
I was thinking I haven't gone up Herman in 7 years and I'd like to do that. Or flandrau. Or sit around either of our houses. What sounds good?
Flandrau or my house I think... At DMV currently...
Why no Herman?
$$$ and lack of interest
Okay. Is anyone at your house? Don't know if I can handle that
Yea there are
So flandrau?
I guess so - Indian point cal de sac? Is that what that's called?
actually god I take that back
How about Herman park?
I'll watch you climb the statue
It is. And yeah. That's definitely better.
When?
Soon? Now? My time is dwindling
Yea Just give me a second, I need something to eat but I'll bring t
No rush really. You can eat
Is Willie busy?
Funny you should ask, on my way
Oh shit OK leaving now
Are you close? I thought time was dwindling...
(01/02) Thank you Mattie, that meant a lot to me. Sorry if I made you feel bad, that's never my intent. I am only so persistent because I care about keeping you
(02/02) in my life in a good way. I'm just trying to be the best I can. Thank you for your honesty and candidness and wisdom
I hope you mean that, bc all stories and rumors aside, you are important to me and I want us to rise above
Also I've seen you posting things about girls and forgot to talk to you about it!
(01/02) I do. Once we said the only way to maintain a true sincere friendship was complete and total honesty and candidness ( I think those were the words) so a
(02/02) s painful as that can be I truly believe in it. And want it. But what stories and rumors are you talking bout? You've got me worried
Also I appreciate girls but don't like it
You shouldn't be worried - I just meant the things Tessa may say whatever, fixated. Why don't you like it?
(01/02) Jeez. I can make my own judgements mattie. I give no creedence to anything she says about you. I'll just trust that you're honest with me and ill have
(02/02) no reason to believe any stories. Re girls: it requires a real convo. Heard of 11th hour, azuya, or rust theater co.'s?
I went on a mini-hike to Indian point and missed you a lot. The world is surreal and beautiful and everything is fine. Don't forget. And I don't think I heard of those theatre companies.
I've been having similar thoughts the past 24 hours. So many things to believe in.
If you have the chance you should call me and tell me what you don't like about girls
